title: President Rajapaksa Challenge Trophy T-20 Tournament kicks off today
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Chandana Perera Arrangements are in place for the staging of the second annual President Mahinda Rajapaksa T20 Under-19 Triangular Cricket Tournament, conducted among three premier national schools in Sri Lanka, Richmond College- Galle, Nalanda College, and the Thurstan College, Colombo on Saturday 08 and Sunday 09 of December (today…
